sentences.en: A large stash of drugs had been found aboard the yacht.
sentences.cn: 在游艇上找到了一大批藏匿的毒品。

sentences.en: Discover the delights and luxury of a private yacht.
sentences.cn: 体验私人游艇的乐趣和奢华。

sentences.en: Frank is of the opinion that the 1934 yacht should have won.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克认为本该是那艘1934年的帆船获胜。

sentences.en: He righted the yacht and continued the race.
sentences.cn: 他调正了快艇，继续比赛。

sentences.en: He was responsible for the location of the missing yacht.
sentences.cn: 他负责查明失踪游艇的下落.

sentences.en: His 36 ft yacht sank suddenly last summer.
sentences.cn: 他的36英尺游艇去年夏天突然沉没了。

sentences.en: It is expected that the new owner will change the yacht's name.
sentences.cn: 估计新主人会给游艇改名。

sentences.en: Our yacht was well equipped with two double cabins fore and aft.
sentences.cn: 我们的游艇设施完备，首尾有两个双人舱。

sentences.en: She invited 750 people aboard the luxury yacht, the Savarona.
sentences.cn: 她邀请了750人乘坐豪华游艇“萨瓦罗纳”号。

sentences.en: The crew seemed unable to right the capsized yacht.
sentences.cn: 水手们好像无法使倾覆的游艇翻过来.

sentences.en: The yacht has sprung a leak in the hull.
sentences.cn: 帆船的船体上出现了一条裂缝。

sentences.en: The yacht is built of cedar strip planking.
sentences.cn: 游艇是用雪松木条建造的。

sentences.en: The yacht now lies in a boatyard at Lymington.
sentences.cn: 这艘游艇现停泊在利明顿的一处船坞里。

sentences.en: The yacht was skippered by Pierre Mas.
sentences.cn: 这艘游艇的船长是皮埃尔·马斯。

sentences.en: We made a tour of the yacht, checking lashings and emergency gear.
sentences.cn: 我们在那艘游艇上四处看了看，检查了它的系索和应急装置。

words.tran_cn: 驾游艇的；爱好帆船运动的

trans.tran_en: a large boat with a sail, used for pleasure or sport, especially one that has a place where you can sleep
